values: 近的；紧密的；亲密的；亲近的；密切的；紧密相关的；可能快要的；几乎的；狭窄的；狭小的；细致的；周到的；详尽的；严密的；严谨的；闷热的；潮湿的；窒息的；贴近的；紧邻的；紧挨的；酷似的；吝啬的；实力相差无几的
关；关门；使关门；关闭；使关闭（一段时间）；封闭；结束；终止；使结束；使终止；靠近；接近；使靠拢；拉近距离；缩小差距；围绕；包围；紧密结合；合上；闭合（伤口）；抱紧；握紧；把…牢牢抱住；把…牢牢抓住；停止营业；不开放；完成交易；达成协议；（股市）收盘
紧密地；靠近地；接近地；贴近地；紧挨着；近似地；几乎；密切地
（一段时间或活动的）结束；结尾；终结；闭幕；封闭；私人领地；僻静街道；僻静小巷；教堂院落；（英国某些学校的）运动场；（走不通的）巷道；死胡同；通道；小径

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 关；结束；接近（close的过去分词）
紧密地；接近地；严密地；亲近地

word_mean_info__list.difference: 语气弱于close，也指时间或空间上的接近，但无“紧接，接触”的含义。
指距离上很近，近在咫尺。
语气强于near。指时间、地点或程度方面的接近，有紧靠、相邻的意味。
通常指因长期交往而彼此很熟悉，像自家人一样。
语气强烈，指感情或思想融洽、相互知心，彼此关系亲密。
指相互之间可推心置腹、彼此信赖。
语气较强，指兴趣爱好相同，因而关系密切，感情深笃。
着重关闭的动作、过程和方式手段。
象声词，指“砰的关上”，或用力关上。
较多地用于正式或庄重的文体中，如关闭铁路、公路以及其它交通渠道，要用close。
正式用词，多指以某事或活动达到预期目的而告终。
与complete基本同义，着重圆满地结束或完成已着手的事。
正式用词，强调一个过程的完成；也可指依靠努力达到一定目的，或取得一定的结果。
强调有一个空间和时间的限度，届时必须终止。书面语用词。
侧重指完成预定的任务或使某事完善，补足缺少的部分等。
最普通用词，着重事情的完成。也指某种活动因达到目的而自然结束或由于某种原因而突然中止。
普通用词，着重行为的终止或结束，不强调其目的。

word_group.brief_definition: 关闭, 停业；停止播放
(尤指受到批评时)抱团, 携手合作
停业, 歇业, 关闭

bilingual.source: He asked me to close the curtains.
Can you help me close the window?
Close the volet to block out the sunlight.
bilingual.target: 关闭百叶窗以挡住阳光。

bilingual.source: The metal gates clank when they close.
bilingual.target: 金属门在关闭时发出叮当声。

bilingual.source: After the meeting, we close the lights.
bilingual.target: 会议结束后，我们关闭了灯。

bilingual.source: The city decided to close the old dumps.
bilingual.target: 市政府决定关闭旧的垃圾场。

bilingual.source: Remember to close the windows before it rains.
bilingual.target: 记得在下雨前关闭窗户。

bilingual.source: This jump ring is easy to open and close.
bilingual.target: 这个卡簧很容易打开和关闭。

list.abstract: close（英 [kləʊz , kləʊs]，美 [kloʊz , kloʊs]），英语单词，作形容词为近的；接近的；靠近的。做副词为接近；紧。作名词为围起的空间；结束；结尾。作动词为关闭；结束；接近。短语搭配有be close to（接近）。例句为“Don't get too close to sleepless people（不要和失眠的人走得太近）”。 close相关近义词有familiar、near等，相关反义词有open、distant。
close，作为英语单词解释为关闭，结束等类似的意思。在PB中Close功能关闭窗口并释放窗口以及窗口上的控件所占据的内存，在Excel中，Close方法的功能为关闭指定的对象。当窗口被关闭后，应用程序就不能再访问已经关闭窗口的属性、实例变量、对象函数、以及窗口上的控件了。

yingyinNormal.en: So we need to close the E.R. Can we do that?
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以需要关闭急诊。这样可以吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Before the sun sets today, I will close down the Gobi trade routes starve Karakorum.
yingyinNormal.zh: 日落之前，我会关闭戈壁的贸易通道，哈拉和林会陷入饥荒。

yingyinNormal.en: So we need to close the E.R.? We're dangerously low on meds. Personnel can't make it in due to the flooding.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以需要关闭急诊吗？药物严重不足，因为洪水，其他医生没法赶来。

yingyinNormal.en: About the school as well? I don't have a home to go to. They wouldn't really close Hogwarts, would they, professor?
yingyinNormal.zh: 学校的事也是吗？我已经无家可归了。他们不会真的关闭霍格沃茨吧，教授？
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets》

yingyinNormal.en: And it's a good thing, too, because if they don't make it back before those doors close, then they are stuck out there for the night.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是好事，如果不这样，他们没有赶在门关闭之前跑出来，就会被困在里面过夜了。

yingyinNormal.en: So were you two close?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那好，你们俩关系好吗？

yingyinNormal.en: How much? Well, close to…
yingyinNormal.zh: 多少？将近有…

yingyinNormal.en: Let me close that for you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 帮你合起来哈。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, right. Don? Close. Ron.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哦，是Don？差不多，是Ron。

yingyinNormal.en: So, she's close to curing diabetes?
yingyinNormal.zh: 她很快就能治愈糖尿病了？

yingyinNormal.en: Diego. It's not even close. Told you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 狄亚哥，你哪有得比 哈，我有没有跟你说过?

yingyinNormal.en: Try less teeth. Close enough. Come on.
yingyinNormal.zh: 笑不露齿。差不多了。

yingyinNormal.en: We found them flying too close to humans.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们发现他们飞得离人类太近。

yingyinNormal.en: Seven. Seven years, but, you know, close.
yingyinNormal.zh: 七年前，七年前，但是 已经很接近了。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, I guess you can close the door now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，我想你可以把门关上了。

yingyinNormal.en: Tell me. Have you ever met a scav up close?
yingyinNormal.zh: 告诉我。你跟掠夺者近距离接触过吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Santa was unavailable so close to Christmas.
yingyinNormal.zh: 圣诞老人没有空，在这么接近圣诞节的时候。

yingyinNormal.en: So fluffy! Sheep never let me get this close!
yingyinNormal.zh: 毛茸茸的呢！绵羊从来不让我靠这么近的！

yingyinNormal.en: Wow. For just a week you guys are really close?
yingyinNormal.zh: 才一个星期就这么亲密了。

yingyinNormal.en: What? Nothing, it's just that it's close to Ron.
yingyinNormal.zh: 怎么了？ 没什么，跟Ron很接近嘛。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 缩小; 接近; 变小
关门; 歇业; 倒闭
接近; 快要(成为; 做...)
差别细微的; 酷似的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 亲密的；紧密的；亲近的；势均力敌的；（close的最高级）
adv. 接近地；严密地；亲近地；紧密地
adj. 关闭的；闭合的；保守的；歇业的；对外封闭的；闭关自守的；限于某些人的；不是对所有人都开放的；并非人人可得的；守旧的
n. 最后的节目；关闭者

word_family.mean: adj. 近的；接近的；靠近的；直系（尤指父母；兄弟姐妹）的；密切的；周全的；潮湿的；气闷的；接近；紧密的

sense_info_list.en: at or within a short distance in space or time or having elements near each other

examination_example.sentence: The opportunities to observe these beautiful wild creatures <highlight>close</highlight> to home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在家附近观察这些美丽的野生动物的机会。

examination_example.sentence: Justice Anthony Kennedy ruled that the state flew too <highlight>close</highlight> to the federal sun.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大法官安东尼·肯尼迪裁定，亚利桑纳州对联邦政府的挑战已经越界。

sense_info_list.en: having a strong liking each one for the other

examination_example.sentence: There is loss of a <highlight>close</highlight> apprenticeship relationship between faculty members and students.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 教职员工和学生之间失去了亲密的学徒关系。

examination_example.sentence: Besides helping you feel <highlight>close</highlight> and connected to people you care about, hugs can bring a host of health benefits.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除了帮助你感受到与你关心的人的亲密和联系，拥抱还能带来许多健康益处。

examination_example.sentence: They called for forging <highlight>closer</highlight> collaborations with western state governments and the private landowners.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们呼吁与西部州政府和私人土地所有者建立更紧密的合作关系。

sense_info_list.en: to make the distance or difference between two things smaller
sense_info_list.zh: 缩小; 接近; 变小

examination_example.sentence: Higher education has "continued to reproduce and widen, rather than <highlight>close</highlight>" an achievement gap based on social class.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 高等教育 “持续复制和扩大，而不是缩小” 基于社会阶层的成绩差距。

examination_example.sentence: The article is actually quite optimistic, suggesting that an approach can <highlight>close</highlight> 63 percent of the achievement gap between first-generation and other students.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这篇文章实际上相当乐观，认为有一种方法可以缩小第一代和其他学生之间63%的成绩差距。

examination_example.sentence: This is the gap that must be narrowed to <highlight>close</highlight> the achievement gap.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只有缩小这一差距才能缩小学业成绩差距。

sense_info_list.zh: 关门; 歇业; 倒闭

examination_example.sentence: Zoos should have been <highlight>closed</highlight> down as they prioritize money making over animals' wellbeing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 动物园应该被关闭，因为他们把赚钱看得比动物的健康更重要。

examination_example.sentence: The big companies buy their most threatening potential competitors, in some cases as part of a "buy and kill" tactic to simply <highlight>close</highlight> them down.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大公司收购他们最具威胁性的潜在竞争对手，在某些情况下，这是“买了就杀”策略的一部分，目的只是为了让它们倒闭。

examination_example.sentence: They bought the seedlings and <highlight>closed</highlight> them down.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们买下那些幼苗（初创公司），然后把那些公司关了。

examination_example.sentence: With the global population predicted to hit <highlight>close</highlight> to 10 billion by 2050, food security is increasingly making headlines.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 到2050年，全球人口预计将接近100亿，粮食安全日益成为头条新闻。

examination_example.sentence: The cost of solar panels has dropped by 80 percent and the cost of wind turbines by <highlight>close</highlight> to one-third.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 太阳能电池板的成本下降了80%，风力涡轮机的成本下降了近三分之一。

sense_info_list.en: (close to)very near to (being or doing something
sense_info_list.zh: 接近; 快要(成为; 做...)

examination_example.sentence: It has not gotten anywhere <highlight>close</highlight> to that, and one big reason is sticker shock.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它还远远没有达到这一水平，一个主要原因是价格令人震惊。

examination_example.sentence: It is going riskily <highlight>close</highlight> to the implication that standards need to be lowered for poor children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这很有可能意味着需要降低贫困儿童的标准。

sense_info_list.en: separate something from other parts so that people cannot use it

examination_example.sentence: Factors will encourage us towards certain interpretations but at the same time obscure or even <highlight>close</highlight> off others.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 各种因素会鼓励我们做出某些解释，但同时也会模糊甚至封闭其他解释。

sense_info_list.en: careful and thorough

examination_example.sentence: Robert Roth keeps a <highlight>close</highlight> eye on the age of his nearly 200 workers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 罗伯特·罗斯密切关注他的近200名工人的年龄。

examination_example.sentence: Unexpected results have two benefits: you pretty quickly learn to deal with disappointment and realize that when one door <highlight>closes</highlight>, another opens.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 意想不到的结果有两个好处:你很快学会处理失望，并意识到当一扇门关闭时，另一扇门会打开。

sense_info_list.en: having only a small difference
sense_info_list.zh: 差别细微的; 酷似的

sense_info_list.en: looking at or listening to someone or something very carefully
bring or come to an end for a period of time or permanently
kept secret or tending to keep secrets
lacking fresh or moving air
giving or spending with reluctance
a road, usually with private houses, that vehicles can only enter from one end

word_usage.usage:
表达几乎（处于某种状态）或快要做某事，可以说close to  sth或close to doing sth.
权威例句：He was close to tears.他快要哭了。

表达“近的、邻近的”
close指距离、时间接近的，也可指人与人之间亲密的，可后接介词to。
near指物理距离不远的，也指有近亲关系的。
next指位置、时间、次序等最为接近的。
adjacent指房屋、建筑物、土地等相距很近的或紧挨在一起的。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 不营业; 打烊; 倒闭

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 关闭；闭锁；封锁；辩论终止提付表决；解脱感；终结感；解脱；减轻；闭锁物
adv. 接近地；严密地；亲近地；紧密地
n. 接近；密闭；亲密；严密

word_family.mean: adj. 近的；接近的；靠近的；直系（尤指父母；兄弟姐妹）的；密切的；周全的；潮湿的；气闷的；接近；紧密的

sense_info_list.en: at or within a short distance in space or time or having elements near each other

examination_example.sentence: It has brought celebrities <highlight>closer</highlight> to their lives.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它让名人更接近他们的生活。

examination_example.sentence: Some king penguins may be able to relocate to new breeding grounds <highlight>closer</highlight> to their retreating food source.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些帝企鹅能够在离食物源更近的地方重新安置新的繁殖地。

examination_example.sentence: The question that most fascinates him is how they got it so <highlight>close</highlight> to perfect.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，最令他着迷的问题是他们如何使它如此接近完美。

sense_info_list.en: having a strong liking each one for the other

examination_example.sentence: This is surprising when you consider the prevailing emphasis by scholars and trainers and managers on the importance of cultivating <highlight>close</highlight> interpersonal relationships at work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你考虑到学者、教练和管理者在工作中培养亲密人际关系盛行的重要性时，这是令人惊讶的。

sense_info_list.zh: 不营业; 打烊; 倒闭

sense_info_list.en: bring or come to an end for a period of time or permanently

examination_example.sentence: There were few museums anywhere in Europe before the <highlight>close</highlight> of the eighteenth century.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 十八世纪末之前欧洲各地的博物馆很少。

sense_info_list.en: looking at or listening to someone or something very carefully
cover the opening of
lacking fresh or moving air

word_usage.usage:
close是非延续性动词，不可与表示一段时间的状语连用。
误 The school closed the swimming pool for two weeks.
正 The school closed the swimming pool two weeks ago.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 普通用词, 着重行为的终止或结束, 不强调其目的。
正式用词, 多指以某事或活动达到预期目的而告终。
最普通用词, 着重事情的完成。也指某种活动因达到目的而自然结束或由于某种原因而突然中止。
语气强于 near。指时间、地点或程度方面的接近, 有紧靠、相邻的意味。
语气弱于 close, 也指时间或空间上的接近, 但无"紧接, 接触"的含义。
指距离上很近, 近在咫尺。
语气较强, 指兴趣爱好相同, 因而关系密切, 感情深笃。
指相互之间可推心置腹、彼此信赖。
通常指因长期交往而彼此很熟悉, 像自家人一样。
语气强烈, 指感情或思想融洽、相互知心, 彼此关系亲密。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 不营业; 打烊; 倒闭

adj. 关闭的；闭合的；保守的；歇业的；对外封闭的；闭关自守的；限于某些人的；不是对所有人都开放的；并非人人可得的；守旧的

word_family.mean: adj. 近的；接近的；靠近的；直系（尤指父母；兄弟姐妹）的；密切的；周全的；潮湿的；气闷的；接近；紧密的

sense_info_list.en: at or within a short distance in space or time or having elements near each other

examination_example.sentence: I confess that with online surveys I just click the option that's <highlight>closest</highlight> to my mouse cursor to get the damn thing off my screen.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我承认在这些线上调查弹出来的时候，我只会点击离我鼠标光标最近的选项，好退出这个该死的弹窗。

examination_example.sentence: Finally, the FBI received a tip that the stolen document was located very <highlight>close</highlight> to Washington, D. C. Their art crime team recovered the letter but were unable to press charges because the time of limitations had ended.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最后，联邦调查局(FBI)收到线索，被盗文件的位置离华盛顿特区非常近。他们的艺术犯罪小组找回了这封信，但由于诉讼时效已经结束，无法提出指控。

examination_example.sentence: It brought cars <highlight>closer</highlight> towards the reach of ordinary people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它拉近了汽车与普通人的距离。

sense_info_list.en: having a strong liking each one for the other

examination_example.sentence: One common French custom of greetings is cheek-kissing, but it is mostly restricted to friends, <highlight>close</highlight> acquaintances and family members.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个常见的法国问候习俗是亲吻脸颊，但它主要限于朋友，熟人和家人。

examination_example.sentence: Either they put their head in the sand: they would avoid examining their financial statements, budgeting, and discussing financial matters with those <highlight>closest</highlight> to them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 要么他们就把头埋在沙子里：他们会避免检查他们的财务报表、预算，以及与最亲近的人讨论财务问题。

examination_example.sentence: It brought family members <highlight>closer</highlight> to each other.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它使家庭成员之间的关系更加亲密。

examination_example.sentence: Being a <highlight>close</highlight> loser could greatly motivate one to persevere in their research.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 成为一个失败者可以极大地激励一个人坚持他们的研究。

examination_example.sentence: But among those who stayed on, the <highlight>close</highlight> losers performed even better than the narrow winners.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但在那些剩下的人里，差点成功的失败者甚至比险胜者还优秀。

examination_example.sentence: He thinks that being a <highlight>close</highlight> loser might give people a psychological boost, or the proverbial kick in the pants.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他认为，一个差点就成功的人可能会受到一种心理上的鼓舞，或者是鞭策。

sense_info_list.zh: 不营业; 打烊; 倒闭

examination_example.sentence: About 400 miles of streets will be <highlight>closed</highlight> to cars.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大约400英里的街道将禁止汽车通行。

examination_example.sentence: About half of its city center will be <highlight>closed</highlight> to cars.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 约半个市中心将禁止汽车通行。

examination_example.sentence: They will be <highlight>closed</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们将打烊。

sense_info_list.en: cover the opening of

examination_example.sentence: Today, when time zones have less and less meaning, there is little tolerance for offices' <highlight>closing</highlight> for lunch.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今天，当时区的意义越来越小时，人们几乎不能容忍办公室在午餐时间关门。

examination_example.sentence: And the playing field is nothing <highlight>close</highlight> to level.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 而且比赛环境也不公平。

sense_info_list.en: bring or come to an end for a period of time or permanently

word_usage.usage:
close是非延续性动词，不可与表示一段时间的状语连用。
误 The school closed the swimming pool for two weeks.
正 The school closed the swimming pool two weeks ago.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 普通用词，着重行为的终止或结束，不强调其目的。
正式用词，多指以某事或活动达到预期目的而告终。
最普通用词，着重事情的完成。也指某种活动因达到目的而自然结束或由于某种原因而突然中止。
语气强于 near。指时间、地点或程度方面的接近，有紧靠、相邻的意味。
语气弱于 close，也指时间或空间上的接近，但无"紧接，接触"的含义。
指距离上很近，近在咫尺。
语气较强，指兴趣爱好相同，因而关系密切，感情深笃。
指相互之间可推心置腹、彼此信赖。
通常指因长期交往而彼此很熟悉，像自家人一样。
语气强烈，指感情或思想融洽、相互知心，彼此关系亲密。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 接近地；严密地；亲近地；紧密地
adj. 关闭的；闭合的；保守的；歇业的；对外封闭的；闭关自守的；限于某些人的；不是对所有人都开放的；并非人人可得的；守旧的

word_family.mean: adj. 近的；接近的；靠近的；直系（尤指父母；兄弟姐妹）的；密切的；周全的；潮湿的；气闷的；接近；紧密的

examination_example.sentence: But what if we're actually getting <highlight>closer</highlight> to a world where Al is capable of thinking and feeling?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是，如果我们实际上越来越接近一个AI能够思考和感觉的世界呢？

examination_example.sentence: In fact, so much traveling was really a good thing because it made us <highlight>close</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，这么多的旅行真的是一件好事，因为它让我们更加亲密。

examination_example.sentence: They look <highlight>close</highlight> to a human, but not quite.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们看起来接近于人类，但又不完全是。

examination_example.sentence: An avalanche (雪崩) once <highlight>closed</highlight> the path, killing 63 people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一场雪崩曾经关闭了这条道路，造成63人死亡。

examination_example.sentence: The movie is set in a small town where the only movie theater is preparing to <highlight>close</highlight> down.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 电影的背景是在一个小镇上，唯一的电影院正准备关闭。

examination_example.sentence: The café is located upstairs in Building 1 and is open daily until one hour before Pacific Science Center <highlight>closes</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 咖啡馆位于1号楼的楼上，每天营业至太平洋科学中心关门前一小时。

examination_example.sentence: Still, most of us volunteers breathe a sigh of relief when the season comes to a <highlight>close</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不过，当这个季节结束时，我们大多数志愿者还是松了一口气。

word_usage.usage:
close和closed都可用作形容词，但是含义有很大差别，closed是由动词close的过去分词转化的形容词，表示“关闭的，未开的”，与open这个形容词表示的含义相反：
The shop is not open. It is closed.
商店没开，关门了。
close经常与together、to连用；副词close表示 “靠近” “接近”，而closely则表示“紧密地” “秘密地”。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 关门; 关闭; 歇业
差别细微的; 酷似的
接近; 快要(成为; 做...)

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 亲密的；紧密的；亲近的；势均力敌的；（close的最高级）
adv. 接近地；严密地；亲近地；紧密地
adj. 关闭的；闭合的；保守的；歇业的；对外封闭的；闭关自守的；限于某些人的；不是对所有人都开放的；并非人人可得的；守旧的
n. 最后的节目；关闭者

word_family.mean: adj. 近的；接近的；靠近的；直系（尤指父母；兄弟姐妹）的；密切的；周全的；潮湿的；气闷的；接近；紧密的

sense_info_list.en: at or within a short distance in space or time or having elements near each other

examination_example.sentence: I'm sure he's <highlight>close</highlight> by.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我肯定他就在附近。

examination_example.sentence: Getting <highlight>closer</highlight> to the car, he noticed that there were five old ladies.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 靠近汽车，他注意到有五位老太太。

sense_info_list.en: having a strong liking each one for the other

examination_example.sentence: Scientists from the University of Leipzig, Germany, found that friendship is also based on how physically <highlight>close</highlight> you are to someone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 德国莱比锡大学的科学家发现，友谊也基于你和某人身体上的亲密程度。

examination_example.sentence: Although the storm broke many things apart, it brought families and neighbors <highlight>closer</highlight> together.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管暴风雨让很多东西分崩离析，但它使家庭和邻居更加亲密。

examination_example.sentence: People who have several <highlight>close</highlight> friends often live happily.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有几个挚友的人往往生活得很幸福。

examination_example.sentence: Adding "dog" to a person's name means that you have a <highlight>closer</highlight> relationship with him or her than others.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一个人的名字中加上“狗”意味着你和他或她的关系比其他人更亲近。

sense_info_list.zh: 关门; 关闭; 歇业

examination_example.sentence: Beijing's Palace Museum <highlight>closes</highlight> at around 4:30 p.m.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 北京故宫博物院下午4点半左右关门。

examination_example.sentence: Thailand will <highlight>close</highlight> one of its beaches to protect its coral from business activities for tourists.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 泰国将关闭一个海滩，以保护其珊瑚免受游客们商业活动的影响。

examination_example.sentence: There were few stores or restaurants in the town; most had <highlight>closed</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 镇上几乎没有商店或餐馆；大多数已经歇业。

sense_info_list.en: cover the opening of

examination_example.sentence: Lily asked her son to <highlight>close</highlight> the door softly in order not to disturb others.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 莉莉让儿子轻轻地关门，以免打扰别人。

examination_example.sentence: The Chinese government <highlight>closed</highlight> off fifty million people in Wuhan and cities near it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 中国政府封锁了武汉及其附近城市的五千万人口。

examination_example.sentence: Each night their bright yellow flowers <highlight>close</highlight> up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每天晚上，它们明亮的黄色花朵都会合拢。

sense_info_list.en: having only a small difference
sense_info_list.zh: 差别细微的; 酷似的

examination_example.sentence: The underlined word "abandoned" in Paragraph 2 is <highlight>closest</highlight> in meaning to "given up".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第2段中带下划线的“abandoned（抛弃）”一词在含义上最接近“given up（放弃）”。

examination_example.sentence: The underlined word "fund" in Paragraph 2 is <highlight>closest</highlight> in meaning to "money".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第2段中带下划线的“fund（基金）”一词在含义上最接近“money（货币）”。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>closest</highlight> thing to watching a film during ancient times was going to see a shadow play.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在古代，和看电影最酷似的事情是去看皮影戏。

sense_info_list.zh: 接近; 快要(成为; 做...)

examination_example.sentence: But those failures put him one step <highlight>closer</highlight> to success.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但这些失败让他离成功又近了一步。

examination_example.sentence: They had no choice but to ask if they could pay the bill after the operation because the patient was <highlight>close</highlight> to death.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们别无选择，只能问是否能在手术后付账，因为病人快死了。

examination_example.sentence: Of course it's disappointing to lose, especially if you are <highlight>close</highlight> to winning.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当然，输了令人失望，尤其是当你快要胜利的时候。

sense_info_list.en: looking at or listening to someone or something very carefully

examination_example.sentence: Also, visitors can come to the island to have a <highlight>close</highlight> look at many kinds of fishes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此外，游客可以来岛上密切观察各种鱼类。

examination_example.sentence: Now, thanks to the robotic fish, researchers may be able to keep a <highlight>close</highlight> eye on fish and discover undersea secrets.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在，多亏了机器鱼，研究人员可能能够密切观察鱼类并发现海底秘密。

examination_example.sentence: Pay <highlight>close</highlight> attention to children's safety.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 要密切注意儿童的安全。

sense_info_list.en: bring or come to an end for a period of time or permanently

examination_example.sentence: Registration (注册) <highlight>closes</highlight> on Sunday, July 21, 2019.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 注册截止日期为2019年7月21日，星期日。

word_usage.usage:
close是非延续性动词，不可与表示一段时间的状语连用。
误 The school closed the swimming pool for two weeks.
正 The school closed the swimming pool two weeks ago.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 语气强于near。指时间、地点或程度方面的接近，也可指人与人之间亲密的，可后接介词 to。
语气弱于close，指时间或空间上的接近，也可指有近亲关系的，但无"紧接，接触"的含义。
较多地用于正式或庄重的文体中，如关闭铁路、公路以及其它交通渠道，要用close。
着重关闭的动作、过程和方式手段。
侧重指完成预定的任务或使某事完善，补足缺少的部分等。
与complete基本同义，着重圆满地结束或完成已着手的事。
最普通用词，着重事情的完成。也指某种活动因达到目的而自然结束或由于某种原因而突然中止。
普通用词，着重行为的终止或结束，不强调其目的。
